content:
I'm thrilled to hear that you're feeling good about your fitness progress! Adding yoga to your routine can have a wonderful impact on your overall well-being. Remember to be patient and gentle with yourself as you explore this new practice.

Given that you already have Zumba on Thursdays, it's excellent that you're considering pacing yourself. It's essential to listen to your body and not overexert yourself, especially when trying out a new activity.

As you begin your yoga journey, keep in mind that it's not about achieving perfection or competing with others. Yoga is a personal practice that focuses on uniting your body, mind, and breath. Be kind to yourself, and don't hesitate to modify or take breaks when needed.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'm always here to help. Wishing you a wonderful yoga experience, and I hope you enjoy your classes!
